articles.description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Tottenham take on Manchester City, with five other matches taking place in the last sixteen of the League Cup.
articles.title: Carabao Cup LIVE: Tottenham v Man City plus five other games - scores, radio commentary & text updates

articles.description: Watch or listen to Open all Mics, follow commentary from Pittodrie or Celtic Park, plus live text updates of Wednesday's six Scottish Premiership matches.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Aberdeen host Rangers in one of six top-flight games

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou's quest to end Tottenham's trophy drought continues as victory over Manchester City sends them into the Carabao Cup quarter-final.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur 2-1 Manchester City: Timo Werner hits first goal of season in victo

articles.description: Ruud van Nistelrooy enjoys a winning start as Manchester United’s interim manager as his side thrash Leicester to reach the EFL Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Carabao Cup: Manchester United 5-2 Leicester - Ruud van Nistelrooy makes winning start

articles.description: Unbeaten Aberdeen make their biggest statement yet by intensifying the pressure on Rangers with an enthralling Scottish Premiership win.
articles.title: Aberdeen vs Rangers: Scottish Premiership - BBC Sport

articles.description: Cody Gakpo scores twice to send Liverpool into the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup as the holders win at Brighton.
articles.title: Gakpo scores twice as holders Liverpool beat Brighton to progress

articles.description: England cricket captain Ben Stokes says a masked gang burgled his home  - when his wife and two children were there - while he was in Pakistan for the recent Test series.
articles.title: Ben Stokes: England captain's home targeted by masked gang

articles.description: Celtic continue their unbeaten start to the Scottish Premiership season with an ultimately comfortable victory over Dundee.
articles.title: Celtic v Dundee: Scottish Premiership - BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Newcastle United vs Chelsea in the League Cup
articles.title: Newcastle United vs Chelsea: League Cup - BBC Sport

articles.description: Daichi Kamada's strike is enough to send Crystal Palace into the quarter-finals of the EFL Cup at the expense of Aston Villa.
articles.title: EFL Cup: Aston Villa 1-2 Crystal Palace - Kamada scores as Palace reach quarter-finals
